nodes.text: Racer A2D-3 was an protocol droid that was used in the droid races on the Nar Shaddaa Promenade during the Grand Acquisitions Race. Sapaaga the Hutt was a frequent better on the Promenade races.
Racer A2D-3 made his first appearance in the "The Great Acquisitions Race" World Event in Star Wars: The Old Republic.
